title: Was Trump Ducky bathing and showerwashing during an epidemic?
subtitle: President Trump blabbed about low-flow bathrooms and dishwashers at an event similar to the election campaign, while the United States recorded a record COVID-19 cases in one day.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: President Trump delivered a speech during the outbreak of the COVID-19 epidemic, responding to bathing and dishwasher operations that were not functioning properly due to low flow levels.
